verses.verse: <S%G27>Beloved,<s%> do not <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> but <S%G1381>test<s%> the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> to see <S%G1487>whether<s%> they are from <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophets<s%> have <S%G1831>gone<s%> out into the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

By <S%G3778>this<s%> you <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> that <S%G3670>confesses<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> has <S%G2064>come<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is from <S%G2316>God;<s%>

and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> that does not <S%G3670>confess<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is not from <S%G2316>God;<s%> and <S%G3778>this<s%> is the [spirit] of the <S%G500>antichrist,<s%> of <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G191>heard<s%> that it is <S%G2064>coming,<s%> and <S%G3568>now<s%> it is <S%G2235>already<s%> in the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

You are from <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5040>little<s%> <S%G5040>children,<s%> and have <S%G3528>overcome<s%> them; <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3173>greater<s%> is He who is in you <S%G2228>than<s%> he who is in the <S%G2889>world.<s%>
They are from the <S%G2889>world;<s%> <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G3778><s%> they <S%G2980>speak<s%> [as] from the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G191>listens<s%> to them.

We are from <S%G2316>God;<s%> he who <S%G1097>knows<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G191>listens<s%> to us; he <S%G3739>who<s%> is not from <S%G2316>God<s%> does not <S%G191>listen<s%> to us. By <S%G3778>this<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G225>truth<s%> and the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4106>error.<s%>

<S%G27>Beloved,<s%> let us <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> for <S%G26>love<s%> is from <S%G2316>God;<s%> and <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G25>loves<s%> is <S%G1080>born<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G1097>knows<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>
The one who does not <S%G25>love<s%> does not <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G26>love.<s%>

By <S%G3778>this<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G5319>manifested<s%> in us, that <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G649>sent<s%> His <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> into the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that we might <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> Him.

In <S%G3778>this<s%> is <S%G26>love,<s%> not that we <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> but that He <S%G25>loved<s%> us and <S%G649>sent<s%> His <S%G5207>Son<s%> [to be] the <S%G2434>propitiation<s%> for our <S%G266>sins.<s%>
<S%G27>Beloved,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> us, we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>

<S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> has <S%G2300>beheld<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> at <S%G4455>any<s%> <S%G4455>time;<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3306>abides<s%> in us, and His <S%G26>love<s%> is <S%G5048>perfected<s%> in us.
By <S%G3778>this<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> that we <S%G3306>abide<s%> in Him and He in us, <S%G3754>because<s%> He has <S%G1325>given<s%> us of His <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

And we have <S%G2300>beheld<s%> and <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> that the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G649>sent<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> [to be] the <S%G4990>Savior<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>
<S%G3739>Whoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3670>confesses<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3306>abides<s%> in him, and he in <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And we have <S%G1097>come<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> and have <S%G4100>believed<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> for us. <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G26>love,<s%> and the one who <S%G3306>abides<s%> in <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3306>abides<s%> in <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3306>abides<s%> in him.

By <S%G3778>this,<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> is <S%G5048>perfected<s%> with us, that we may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3954>confidence<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> as He is, so <S%G2532>also<s%> are we in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world.<s%>

There is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> in <S%G26>love;<s%> but <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G906>casts<s%> out <S%G5401>fear,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G2192>involves<s%> <S%G2851>punishment,<s%> and the one who <S%G5399>fears<s%> is not <S%G5048>perfected<s%> in <S%G26>love.<s%>
We <S%G25>love,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> He <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> us.

<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G5100>someone<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> "I <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>" and <S%G3404>hates<s%> his <S%G80>brother,<s%> he is a <S%G5583>liar;<s%> for the one who does not <S%G25>love<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he has <S%G3708>seen,<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he has not <S%G3708>seen.<s%>
